alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:54PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cochise County through 345 PM MST... At 253 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong area of thunderstorms extending from 19 miles north of Benson to near Dragoon. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Benson, St. David, Dragoon and Texas Canyon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 303 and 327. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham
